Summary: Two unidentified lights in NE and SW locations of early morning sky.
divs: sighting detailsmy husband gets up to smoke cigarettes at night. he has been observing something in the night sky on and off for about two weeks now. he took three photographs of a bright light above our house with his cell phone about a week ago. he described the light\object as a ufo and says he can see an arm coming out of each side with his naked eye. he has seen two different objects on various occasions, and thinks he may have seen a third but is unsure. he advised me they move too quickly to be easily explained, are too bright to be stars, and do not have any blinking lights to indicate they are airplanes. he has told me that he has watched them remain stationary, move, and change direction. he has said the objects remain in the sky for roughly thirty minutes to an hour when they are there. i can not recall if he has observed them appear or disappear. i am unable to easily identify the object he has taken with his cell phone camera, however the roof of our house is clearly visible and a bright light is visible above it. our house is located around the galleria area of houston, which makes observing stars virtually impossible. the house faces north, with artificial lighting provided by one street lamp on the north side of the house and one theft-deterrent light above the neighboring business to the west. the photos are three consecutive shots facing south with a bright light in the south. i requested my husband wake me up the next time he saw the objects\lights. on august 25th, 2009 at approximately 4:30am, my husband woke me up to tell me there was one object in the southwest portion of the sky. he advised me to look directly to the right of the building next to our house. he remained inside with our sleeping baby. i went outside and observed a single dot of light in the sky where he indicated. i returned in to confirm with him that this was the object he has been seeing. he advised me that it was. i returned outside with a digital camera and digital video camera. i attempted to capture the object in a series of 18 photographs from 4:51am until 5:06am. the camera had extreme difficulty in automatically focusing on the light even after i changed to a telephoto lens. the digital video camera had difficulty maintaining focus on the light when i zoomed in, as it also has an automatic focus feature. i am unable to adjust the focus for either manually. a second light appeared in the northwestern area of the sky and appeared much smaller and farther away. my husband advised me this was a second object he had also been seeing. i recorded the second object with the digital video camera only. my husband, myself, and our (now awake) baby all returned inside our house some time after 5:00 am when the baby became fussy. both lights remained visible in the night sky when we returned inside. both objects had moved from their positions significantly since observing their original locations. i would appreciate someone from mufon following up with me on this report so i can submit the photographs and video recording in full. i can provide more comprehensive details of the sighting if necessary, however this report contains the majority. i am hoping the photographs and video footage can be enhanced. more information will be provided to authorized mufon persons upon request.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around August 25th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
